content: 2021 Singaporean television series ***My Star Bride*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 过江新娘) is a 2021 Singaporean [romantic comedy](/wiki/Romantic_comedy) drama series starring [Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng) and [Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin). It was the most-watched [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) programme of the year, attracting more than 582,000 viewers on average per episode. At the [Star Awards 2022](/wiki/Star_Awards_2022), it was named [Best Drama Serial](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Drama_Serial). In China, *My Star Bride* topped the list of foreign dramas available on major streaming site [Youku](/wiki/Youku), just within three days of its release on the platform. ## Cast - [Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng) as Mei Fangcao (Mai Phương Thảo) - [Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin) as Zhong Shijie - [Edwin Goh](/wiki/Edwin_Goh) as Zhong Shiming - [Gini Chang](/wiki/Gini_Chang) as Ouyang Shanshan (Mai Phương Nhi / Mei Fangni) - [Desmond Ng](/wiki/Desmond_Ng) as Qin Shengli - [Cynthia Koh](/wiki/Cynthia_Koh) as Zhong Peipei - [Rayson Tan](/wiki/Rayson_Tan) as Zhang Daqian - [Zhu Houren](/wiki/Zhu_Houren) as Zhong Yongnian - [Lin Meijiao](/wiki/Lin_Meijiao) as Pan Xiuqin - [Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping) as Ouyang Long - [Aileen Tan](/wiki/Aileen_Tan) as Tang Liyin - Bunz as Liao Zhengda - Christy Mai as Kimberly - [Glenn Yong](/wiki/Glenn_Yong) as Osmond - Vanessa Ho as Bella - [Jernelle Oh](/wiki/Jernelle_Oh) as Hu Xianglan (Hồ Hương Lan) - Daryl-Ann as Yuzhen (Ngọc Trinh) - [Cheryl Chou](/wiki/Cheryl_Chou) as Xiao Songya - Alan Tan as Hu Wenhua (Hồ Văn Hoa) ### Special appearances - [Brandon Wong](/wiki/Brandon_Wong_(actor)) as Zhong - [Jin Yinji](/wiki/Jin_Yinji) as Zhenzhu - [Kayly Loh](/wiki/Kayly_Loh) as Susu ## Spinoff sequel A telemovie sequel titled *My Star Bride - Hi, Mai Phương Thảo* (过江新娘 - 你好，梅芳草) began filming in early December 2021 and lasted for three weeks. It was released on 1 February 2022. The telemovie, which runs at 104 minutes, features most of the characters from the television series with [Shane Pow](/wiki/Shane_Pow) joining the returning cast. ## Awards and nominations AwardsCategoryRecipientResultRef.[Asian Academy Creative Awards 2021](/wiki/Asian_Academy_Creative_Awards)Best Actress in a Supporting Role (National Winners - Singapore)[Cynthia Koh](/wiki/Cynthia_Koh)WonNew York Festivals TV and Films Awards 2022Best Original Music / Lyrics"Revise"BronzeBest Performance by an Actress[Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng)Finalist[Star Awards 2022](/wiki/Star_Awards_2022)[Best Drama Serial](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Drama_Serial)*My Star Bride*Won[Best Theme Song](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Theme_Song)"Revise"Won[Best Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Actor)[Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin)Nominated[Best Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Actress)[Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng)Nominated[Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor)[Zhu Houren](/wiki/Zhu_Houren)Nominated[Best Supporting Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actress)[Lin Meijiao](/wiki/Lin_Meijiao)Won[Cynthia Koh](/wiki/Cynthia_Koh)Nominated[Favourite Male Show Stealer](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Male_Show_Stealer)[Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin)Won[Favourite Female Show Stealer](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Female_Show_Stealer)[Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng)Won[Favourite CP](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Onscreen_Couple_(Drama))[Xu Bin](/wiki/Xu_Bin) and [Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng)Won - *My Star Bride* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *My Star Bride* at [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) - *My Star Bride Telemovie - Hi, Mai Phương Thảo* at [YouTube](/wiki/YouTube) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. title: My Star Bride
